description:
Keep a cool head on hot days. This highly breathable cap is made with plenty of recycled material so you feel great about your contribution to the environment while staying cool. A DWR finish has you covered when the weather turns.Polyester fabric (87% recycled content) is highly breathable to allow heat to escape.Headband is recycled Capilene™ Cool Trail fabric with sweat activated cooling and HeiQ® Fresh antimicrobial treatment.Brim is made of Bureo NetPlus™ recycled fishing nets.Velcro® adjustable closure fits most heads.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Airshed Cap - Unisex
